cnd14:2.1: Majjhe sarasmim titthatanti saro vuccati samsaro agamanam gamanam gamanagamanam kalam gati bhavabhavo cuti ca upapatti ca nibbatti ca bhedo ca jati ca jara ca marananca.
cnd14:2.2: Samsarassa purimapi koti na pannayati, pacchimapi koti na pannayati;
cnd14:2.3: majjheva samsare satta thita patitthita allina upagata ajjhosita adhimutta.
cnd14:3.1: Katham samsarassa purima koti na pannayati?
cnd14:3.2: Ettaka jatiyo vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:3.3: Ettakani jatisatani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:3.4: Ettakani jatisahassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:3.5: Ettakani jatisatasahassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:3.6: Ettaka jatikotiyo vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:3.7: Ettakani jatikotisatani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:3.8: Ettakani jatikotisahassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti, hevam natthi.
cnd14:3.9: Evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:3.10: Ettakani jatikotisatasahassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:4.1: Ettakani vassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:4.2: Ettakani vassasatani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:4.3: Ettakani vassasahassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:4.4: Ettakani vassasatasahassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:4.5: Ettaka vassakotiyo vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:4.6: Ettakani vassakotisatani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:4.7: Ettakani vassakotisahassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:4.8: Ettakani vassakotisatasahassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:5.1: Ettakani kappani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:5.2: Ettakani kappasatani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:5.3: Ettakani kappasahassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:5.4: Ettakani kappasatasahassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:5.5: Ettaka kappakotiyo vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:5.6: Ettakani kappakotisatani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:5.7: Ettakani kappakotisahassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:5.8: Ettakani kappakotisatasahassani vattam vatti, tato param na vattatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:6.2: “anamataggoyam, bhikkhave, samsaro, pubba koti na pannayati avijjanivarananam sattanam tanhasamyojananam sandhavatam samsaratam.
cnd14:6.3: Evam digharattam kho, bhikkhave, dukkham paccanubhutam tibbam paccanubhutam byasanam paccanubhutam, katasi vaddhita.
cnd14:6.4: Yavancidam, bhikkhave, alameva sabbasankharesu nibbinditum alam virajjitum alam vimuccitun”ti.
cnd14:6.5: Evampi samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:7.1: Katham samsarassa pacchima koti na pannayati?
cnd14:7.2: Ettaka jatiyo vattam vattissati, tato param na vattissatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa pacchima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:7.3: Ettakani jatisatani, ettakani jatisahassani, ettakani jatisatasahassani …pe…
cnd14:7.4: ettaka jatikotiyo, ettakani jatikotisatani, ettakani jatikotisahassani, ettakani jatikotisatasahassani, ettakani vassani, ettakani vassasatani, ettakani vassasahassani, ettakani vassasatasahassani, ettaka vassakotiyo, ettakani vassakotisatani, ettakani vassakotisahassani, ettakani vassakotisatasahassani, ettakani kappani, ettakani kappasatani, ettakani kappasahassani, ettakani kappasatasahassani, ettaka kappakotiyo, ettakani kappakotisatani, ettakani kappakotisahassani, ettakani kappakotisatasahassani vattam vattissati, tato param na vattissatiti hevam natthi, evampi samsarassa pacchima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:7.5: Evampi samsarassa purimapi koti na pannayati, pacchimapi koti na pannayati, majjheva samsare satta thita patitthita allina upagata ajjhosita adhimuttati—
cnd14:8.1: Oghe jate mahabbhayeti kamoghe bhavoghe ditthoghe avijjoghe jate sanjate nibbatte abhinibbatte patubhute.
cnd14:9.2: Maccuna phutthanam paretanam samohitanam samannagatanam, jatiya anugatanam jaraya anusatanam byadhina abhibhutanam maranena abbhahatanam atananam alenanam asarananam asaranibhutananti—
cnd14:10.1: Dipam pabruhi marisati dipam tanam lenam saranam gatim parayanam bruhi acikkhahi desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivarahi vibhajahi uttanikarohi pakasehi.
cnd14:11.3: Dipamakkhahiti dipam tanam lenam saranam gatim parayanam akkhahi acikkhahi desehi pannapehi patthapehi vivarahi vibhajahi uttanikarohi pakasehiti—
cnd14:12.1: Yathayidam naparam siyati yathayidam dukkham idheva nirujjheyya vupasameyya attham gaccheyya patippassambheyya punapatisandhikam dukkham na nibbatteyya, kamadhatuya va rupadhatuya va arupadhatuya va kamabhave va rupabhave va arupabhave va sannabhave va asannabhave va nevasannanasannabhave va ekavokarabhave va catuvokarabhave va pancavokarabhave va punagatiya va upapattiya va patisandhiya va bhave va samsare va vatte va na janeyya na sanjaneyya na nibbatteyya nabhinibbatteyya.
cnd14:12.2: Idheva nirujjheyya vupasameyya attham gaccheyya patippassambheyyati—
cnd14:15.1: Majjhe sarasmim titthatanti saro vuccati samsaro agamanam gamanam gamanagamanam kalam gati bhavabhavo, cuti ca upapatti ca nibbatti ca bhedo ca jati ca jara ca marananca.
cnd14:15.2: Samsarassa purimapi koti na pannayati, pacchimapi koti na pannayati.
cnd14:15.3: Majjheva samsare satta thita patitthita allina upagata ajjhosita adhimutta.
cnd14:16.1: Katham samsarassa purima koti na pannayati …pe…
cnd14:16.2: evam samsarassa purima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:16.3: Katham samsarassa pacchima koti na pannayati …pe…
cnd14:16.4: evam samsarassa pacchima koti na pannayati.
cnd14:16.5: Evam samsarassa purimapi koti na pannayati, pacchimapi koti na pannayati.
cnd14:16.6: Majjheva samsare satta thita patitthita allina upagata ajjhosita adhimuttati—
cnd14:17.1: Oghe jate mahabbhayeti kamoghe bhavoghe ditthoghe avijjoghe jate sanjate nibbatte abhinibbatte patubhute.
cnd14:18.1: Jaramaccuparetananti jaraya phutthanam paretanam samohitanam samannagatanam, maccuna phutthanam paretanam samohitanam samannagatanam jatiya anugatanam jaraya anusatanam byadhina abhibhutanam maranena abbhahatanam atananam alenanam asarananam asaranibhutananti—
cnd14:19.1: Dipam pabrumi kappa teti dipam tanam lenam saranam gatim parayanam brumi acikkhami desemi pannapemi patthapemi vivarami vibhajami uttanikaromi pakasemiti—
cnd14:22.3: ragakincanam dosakincanam mohakincanam manakincanam ditthikincanam kilesakincanam duccaritakincanam;
cnd14:22.4: kincanappahanam kincanavupasamam kincanapatinissaggam kincanapatippassaddhim amatam nibbananti—
cnd14:22.7: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
cnd14:22.8: Adanappahanam adanavupasamam adanapatinissaggam adanapatippassaddhim amatam nibbananti—
cnd14:23.1: Etam dipam anaparanti etam dipam tanam lenam saranam gati parayanam.
cnd14:23.3: Atha kho so evam dipo aggo ca settho ca visettho ca pamokkho ca uttamo ca pavaro cati—
cnd14:24.1: Nibbanam iti nam brumiti vanam vuccati tanha.
cnd14:24.2: Yo rago sarago …pe… abhijjha lobho akusalamulam.
cnd14:24.3: Vanappahanam vanavupasamam vanapatinissaggam vanapatippassaddhim amatam nibbanam.
cnd14:24.4: Ititi padasandhi padasamsaggo padaparipuri akkharasamavayo byanjanasilitthata padanupubbatapetam—
cnd14:24.6: Brumiti brumi acikkhami desemi pannapemi patthapemi vivarami vibhajami uttanikaromi pakasemiti—
cnd14:25.1: Jaramaccuparikkhayanti jaramaranassa pahanam vupasamam patinissaggam patippassaddhim amatam nibbananti—
cnd14:28.3: Yo so sabbasankharasamatho sabbupadhipatinissaggo tanhakkhayo virago nirodho nibbanam.
cnd14:28.4: Annayati annaya janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva, “sabbe sankhara anicca”ti …pe…
cnd14:28.5: “yam kinci samudayadhammam, sabbam tam nirodhadhamman”ti annaya janitva tulayitva tirayitva vibhavayitva vibhutam katva.
cnd14:29.2: Ditthadhammati ditthadhamma natadhamma tulitadhamma tiritadhamma vibhutadhamma vibhavitadhamma.
cnd14:29.4: sabbakusalabhisankharanam santatta samitatta vupasamitatta nijjhatatta nibbutatta patippassaddhatta santa upasanta vupasanta nibbuta patippassaddhati—
cnd14:30.2: Maroti yo so maro kanho adhipati antagu namuci pamattabandhu.
cnd14:30.3: Na te maravasanugati na te marassa vase vattanti, napi maro tesu vasam vatteti.
cnd14:30.4: Te maranca marapakkhanca marapasanca marabalisanca maramisanca maravisayanca maranivasanca maragocaranca marabandhananca abhibhuyya abhibhavitva ajjhottharitva pariyadiyitva madditva caranti viharanti iriyanti vattenti palenti yapenti yapentiti—
cnd14:31.1: Na te marassa paddhaguti na te marassa paddha paddhacara paricarika siya;
cnd14:31.2: buddhassa te bhagavato paddha paddhacara paricarika siyati—
